summary: This module contains a comprehensive collection of unit tests that verify the functionality of the ANSYS MAPDL plotting utilities. The tests exercise MapdlPlotter and related visualisation functions across a range of scenarios, including boundary condition labeling, color area handling, node and element selection, file output formats, interactive plotting, error handling for missing components, and configuration of plot options.
business_intent: To ensure the reliability and correctness of the MAPDL Python API's visualization features, providing confidence that plots are generated accurately, handle edge cases gracefully, and integrate properly with the MAPDL simulation environment.
